channel.title: Lumby-Pvp help?
channel.description:
[u]Source:[/u][i]Lumby-Pvp[/i]
[u]How many probloms:[/u][i]3[/i]
[u]Extra Information:[/u] Well 1. need help fixing 100 errors =\ 2. pickup up enabled for players 3. and opening doors
If anyone could help reply please do! It's important to me :P

item.title: Lumby-Pvp help?
item.dc:creator: @Xillion Xillion
item.description:
@Xillion wrote:

  1. You must’ve deleted a } or { somewhere.

  2. Search for (command.startsWith(“pickup”) in your client.java and replace that entire line with if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 0) {

  3. Add the object ID to doors.cfg that should work.

Read full topic
